title: "Lift or Elevator" means an appliance designed to transport persons and materials between two or more levels in a vertical or substantially vertical direction by means of guided car or platform etc
clause_text: "Lift or Elevator" means an appliance designed to transport persons and materials between two or more levels in a vertical or substantially vertical direction by means of guided car or platform etc.

source_pdf.text_snippet: "Lift or Elevator" means an appliance designed to transport persons and materials between two or more levels in a vertical or substantially vertical direction by means of guided car or platform etc.
